roleset.name: to distribute by measure, allot
roleset.note: METE_OUT-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire. (from mete.01-v)

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: Sen. Edward Kennedy attached an amendment that would allow a defendant to escape from a death sentence in [jurisdictions]-1 shown to have PRO-1 meted out executions in a racist manner.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: This includes plans to "hand [police, local authorities and the courts]-1 sweeping powers PRO-1 to mete out severe punishments to those involved in the unrest," and perhaps even crowd-control tactics like water cannons, according to the AP.
example.arg: to those involved in the unrest.
